# DECORATOR::DECOR_GET_BOOL

## Summary
Get the value of an BOOL decorator

## Parameters
* **ITEM_INDEX** guid: Object to remove decorators from
* **STRING** decoratorName: Name of the decorator

## Returns
* **BOOL**: value of the decorator
